Job Opportunities

Do you want to apply to be one of our Winter Helpers? Do you want to be part of a team that helps keep our city safe? We take care of our team members and always show our gratitude and appreciation with warm beverages, meals, incentives and bonuses. Please inquire within.

SNOW PLOW OPERATORS
$40-50/hr
SNOW REMOVAL FOREMEN / SALTERS
$35-$50/hr
SNOW
SHOVELLERS
$25
INDEPENDENT QUAD OPERATORS
$95/hr

Ready to get started?

The sooner you submit an ice and snow removal quote request, the faster we can address your winter needs. Don’t be left out in the cold!

SNOW SHOVELLERS

Requirements – MUST HAVE:

  • Own 4x4 truck / SUV
  • Snow tires
  • 24/7 availability through the winter season
  • Work-related references
  • Legal ability to work in Canada
  • Ability to make it to Port Coquitlam in 20 minutes in the snow

Responsibilities:

  • Quick response to dispatch at all hours
  • Clear snow on assigned properties (route supplied by dispatch)
  • Fill out log sheets and submit upon completion
